events.comment: MENU Global : -1 = off, 0 = Main Menu, 1 = Map, 2 = Item, 3 = Rune, 4 = Equip, 5 = Status, 6 = Save, 7 = Quit

sub-events.comment:
DEFAULT KEYBOARD CONTROLS Up Up Down Down Left Left Right Right Action Shift Attack Ctrl Item Spacebar Rune Z Alt X Menu Return
Keyboard ON States
If joystick used, disable Dpad. If Dpad used, disable joystick. This keeps the game from getting confused about ON/OFF states for directional controls.

GAMEPAD CONTROLS Up Up Down Down Left Left Right Right Attack X Action A Item Y Rune B Alt Trigger Menu Pause
Gamepad ON States

Function Control for Spell BG. Param3 = Red Param4 = Green Param5 = Blue
Param6 = water effect Param7 = overlay effect
Make sure to subtract 1 coin for every save attempt

events.comment: Time is always tick tock ticking away...

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Debug Mode" &newline& newline& "Quest Progress : " & g_gamedata.At(0,1,0) &newline& "Map : " & LayoutName &newline& "Scroll : " & scrollx & ", " & scrolly &newline& "Touch : " & g_con_touch.X & ", " & g_con_touch.Y
